column4: There is one thing I do NOT understand,.. Why is there so many distro ? I mean, its all the same packages and just a new logo !
hum,.. Iam boored,.. can somebody recommend me something to do ? (nothing with computers)
set up a paper cup 10ft away from you. then using only a rubberband and a quarter, find out how many times you can shoot the quarter into the cup with cup being vertical.
